summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of Faith by Experiments app with real FastAPI backend + MongoDB integration. All core features working: user auth (signup/login), admin auth with dashboard redirect, posts CRUD via API, and live page synchronization.
critical_code_review_comments: Test posts created during backend testing (TEST_Post_*, Updated Title) remain in database - consider cleanup mechanism
MOCKED: POST /api/auth/subscribe - marks user as subscribed without actual payment processing
seed_data_creation: Database seeded via /api/seed endpoint with admin user and initial 'Introduction to Faith by Experiments' post
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs tested with pytest (25 tests). Frontend UI flows verified with Playwright: homepage loads, flagship contents page shows posts from API, admin login redirects to dashboard, admin can create/edit/delete posts, posts appear on live /flagship-contents page. Subscription endpoint is MOCKED (no payment).

backend_api_tests.signup_success: PASS - Returns JWT token and user data
backend_api_tests.get_posts_with_auth: PASS - Returns full content for subscribed

frontend_ui_tests.homepage_loads: PASS - Homepage loads with flagship section
frontend_ui_tests.flagship_contents_page: PASS - Shows posts from API (4 posts)
frontend_ui_tests.admin_create_post: PASS - Post created and appears on dashboard
frontend_ui_tests.user_signup: PASS - New user created and redirected to homepage

mocked_apis.POST /api/auth/subscribe: MOCKED - Marks user as subscribed without payment processing
